terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.intro: These Terms and Conditions of Use govern the legal relationship between POOL & CHILL, a commercial company incorporated under the laws of the United Mexican States, and the individuals or legal entities that use the digital platform called "Pool & Chill", whether through mobile application or website. By accessing, registering, or using the Platform in any of its modalities, the User expressly, irrevocably, and unconditionally agrees to be bound by these Terms, as well as the Privacy Policy and other policies published on the Platform.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any inquiry, clarification, or notification related to these Terms, Users may contact Pool & Chill through the contact channels provided on the Platform. All official notifications and communications between Pool & Chill and Users shall be made by email to the address registered in the User's account or by publication on the Platform.

partiesObject.title: I. Parties and Object of the Contract
content: 1.1. These Terms and Conditions of Use (hereinafter, the "Terms") govern the legal relationship between POOL & CHILL, a commercial company incorporated under the laws of the United Mexican States (hereinafter, "Pool & Chill", "the Platform" or "we"), and the individuals or legal entities that use the digital platform called "Pool & Chill" (hereinafter, the "Users", "Hosts", "Guests" or "you"), whether through mobile application or website.

1.2. The Pool & Chill Platform operates as a digital marketplace that facilitates technological intermediation between Hosts (owners or administrators of pools and properties) and Guests (persons who wish to book the temporary use of such spaces).

1.3. By accessing, registering, or using the Platform in any of its modalities, the User expressly, irrevocably, and unconditionally agrees to be bound by these Terms, as well as the Privacy Policy and other policies published on the Platform. If the User does not agree with these Terms, they must refrain from using the Platform.

1.4. These Terms constitute an adhesion contract entered into between Pool & Chill and the User, in accordance with the provisions of the Federal Civil Code, the Commercial Code, and the Federal Consumer Protection Law.

serviceNature.title: II. Nature of the Service and Disclaimer of Liability
content: 2.1. Pool & Chill acts exclusively as a technological intermediary and facilitator of transactions between Hosts and Guests. The Platform is not the owner, administrator, lessor, or directly responsible for the properties, pools, facilities, or services offered by Hosts.

2.2. Pool & Chill does not exercise any control over the quality, safety, physical or legal condition, or any other aspect of the properties listed on the Platform. Verification of such conditions is the exclusive responsibility of the Host and the Guest.

2.3. There is no employment, professional services, partnership, mandate, or representation relationship between Pool & Chill and the Hosts. Hosts act independently and autonomously and are responsible for complying with all legal, tax, and administrative obligations that apply to them.

2.4. The direct contractual relationship is established between the Host and the Guest. Pool & Chill only facilitates the technological connection and payment processing and does not assume any responsibility for breach of obligations arising from the contractual relationship between Host and Guest.

2.5. Pool & Chill does not guarantee the continuous and uninterrupted availability of the Platform, or the absence of technical errors, system failures, interruptions, or service deficiencies. The User accepts that the Platform is provided "as is" and "as available".

commissions.title: III. Commission and Fee Model
content: 3.1. For the technological intermediation and services provided, Pool & Chill receives commissions on the total value of each confirmed reservation.

3.1.1. Host Commission: The Host shall pay Pool & Chill a commission equivalent to five percent (5%) of the total reservation value, excluding taxes.
3.1.2. Guest Commission: The Guest shall pay Pool & Chill a commission equivalent to five percent (5%) of the total reservation value, excluding taxes.
3.1.3. Total Commission: The total commission received by Pool & Chill is equivalent to ten percent (10%) of the total reservation value, excluding taxes.

3.2. Payment processing through Stripe:
3.2.1. Payments are processed through the Stripe payment platform, which retains approximately three point seven percent (3.7%) of the total processed as a payment processing fee.
3.2.2. After deducting Stripe's commission, Pool & Chill receives the remaining six point three percent (6.3%) as commission for its technological intermediation services.

3.3. The commissions set forth in this clause may be modified by Pool & Chill upon prior notice to Users of at least thirty (30) days, by publication on the Platform or direct communication to the registered email address. Continued use of the Platform after such notice shall constitute acceptance of the new commissions.
3.4. All fees and commissions are stated in Mexican pesos (MXN) and are exclusive of taxes, unless otherwise expressly indicated.

reservations.title: IV. Rates and Reservations
content: 4.1. Base rates: Hosts shall freely set the base rates for the use of their properties and pools, which must be clearly reflected on the Platform.

4.2. Special rates: Hosts may set differentiated rates for high season, holidays, special events, or any other circumstance they deem relevant, provided that such rates are clearly specified in the property listing.
4.3. Date blocking: Hosts may block specific dates on which their properties will not be available for reservations.

4.4. Confirmation subject to availability: Every reservation request is subject to the actual availability of the property at the time of confirmation. Pool & Chill does not guarantee the availability of any property listed on the Platform.

4.5. Schedules and occupancy limits: Hosts shall set the permitted hours of use and maximum occupancy limits for their properties. The Guest is obligated to strictly comply with such schedules and limits, under penalty of contractual breach and liability for damages.
4.6. Reservations shall be deemed confirmed only when the Guest has completed the payment process and received written confirmation from the Platform or the Host.

cancellationPolicy.title: V. Cancellation and Refund Policy
content: 5.1. The User agrees that the following cancellation and refund policies apply to all reservations made through the Platform.

5.2. Cancellation by the Guest:
• 7 days or more in advance: 100% refund of the amount paid, excluding Pool & Chill commissions and Stripe charges.
• Less than 7 days but more than 48 hours: 75% refund of the amount paid, excluding Pool & Chill commissions and Stripe charges.
• Less than 48 hours: 50% refund of the amount paid, excluding Pool & Chill commissions and Stripe charges.
• No show (failure to appear without prior cancellation): No refund shall be due.

5.3. Cancellation by the Host: If the Host cancels a confirmed reservation, they must refund the Guest 100% of the amount paid, and Pool & Chill may apply sanctions including temporary or permanent suspension of the Host's account.

5.4. Force majeure: If the reservation cannot be fulfilled due to duly documented force majeure circumstances (including natural disasters, pandemics, government restrictions, armed conflicts, acts of terrorism, failures of essential public services), the Guest shall be entitled to a 100% refund of the amount paid or to reschedule the reservation for a later date.

5.5. Refunds shall be processed through the same payment method used for the original reservation and may take between five (5) and fifteen (15) business days to be reflected, depending on the payment processor's policies.

liability.title: VI. Liability and Exemptions
content: 6.1. Disclaimer of liability for accidents: Pool & Chill shall not be liable under any circumstances for accidents, injuries, physical harm, material loss, illness, death, or any other damage occurring on the properties, pools, or facilities offered by Hosts.

6.2. Host liability: The Host is solely responsible for ensuring that their property, pool, and facilities comply with all applicable safety, construction, public health, civil protection, and other regulations.

6.3. Guest liability: The Guest is responsible for using the property and facilities properly, complying with the rules set by the Host, and assuming responsibility for any damage caused to the Host's property or to third parties during use.

6.4. Limitation of liability: In no event shall Pool & Chill's total liability to any User exceed the total amount of commissions actually charged and received by Pool & Chill in connection with the specific reservation that is the subject of the claim.

6.5. Indemnification: Users expressly agree to hold harmless, indemnify, defend, and keep Pool & Chill, and its directors, officers, employees, agents, affiliates, subsidiaries, and representatives, harmless from and against any claim, demand, action, proceeding, loss, damage, liability, cost, expense, administrative sanction, fine, and attorneys' fees arising from use of the Platform, breach of these Terms, or violation of any law or third-party rights. This obligation shall survive the termination of the contractual relationship.

prohibitedConduct.title: VII. Prohibited Conduct
content: 7.1. Users agree not to engage in, permit, or facilitate any of the following prohibited conduct:

• Unauthorized events: Holding events, parties, mass gatherings, or any activity not expressly authorized by the Host that exceeds the maximum number of persons allowed.
• Unlawful use: Using the properties or the Platform for any illegal, fraudulent, or deceptive activity or any activity that violates applicable law.
• Excess number of persons: Allowing more persons than stated in the reservation to access the property without prior written authorization from the Host.
• Property damage: Causing intentional or negligent damage to the Host's property.
• Illegal activities: Carrying out, facilitating, or permitting any activity that constitutes an offense under Mexican or international law.

7.2. Violation of any prohibited conduct shall result in immediate suspension of the User's account, cancellation of active reservations without right to refund, and the possibility that Pool & Chill may take legal action against the offending User.

accountSuspension.title: VIII. Account Suspension or Cancellation
content: 8.1. Pool & Chill reserves the right to suspend or cancel, temporarily or permanently, the account of any User who fails to comply with these Terms, Platform policies, or any applicable law.

8.2. Grounds for suspension or cancellation of an account include:
• Breach of contractual obligations set forth in these Terms.
• Fraud, deception, identity theft, or any fraudulent activity.
• Conduct that endangers the safety of other Users or third parties.
• Violation of the prohibited conduct set forth in Clause VII.
• Providing false, inaccurate, or misleading information during registration or use of the Platform.
• Attempting to circumvent or manipulate the payment system, commissions, or any other Platform mechanism.
8.3. Suspension or cancellation of an account does not release the User from fulfilling their pending obligations, including payment of commissions, refunds, or indemnifications that may apply.

intellectualProperty.title: IX. Intellectual Property
content: 9.1. The "Pool & Chill" brand, logos, designs, graphic interfaces, source code, databases, algorithms, and any other element of the Platform are the exclusive property of Pool & Chill or its licensors and are protected by Mexican and international intellectual property laws, including the Federal Copyright Law and the Industrial Property Law.

9.2. Users do not acquire any ownership rights in the foregoing elements and are expressly prohibited from using, reproducing, modifying, distributing, transmitting, publicly displaying, or creating derivative works from such elements without prior written authorization from Pool & Chill.

9.3. Content provided by Users (including photographs, descriptions, comments, and reviews) may be used by Pool & Chill for the operation, promotion, and improvement of the Platform, without any obligation to pay or give recognition to the User.

minors.title: X. Protection of Minors
content: 10.1. The Platform is intended for persons of legal age (18 years) with legal capacity to contract under Mexican law.

10.2. Minors may use the Platform only under the supervision and responsibility of their parents, guardians, or legal representatives, who shall be responsible for all actions taken by minors in their care.
10.3. Pool & Chill shall not be liable for use of the Platform by minors without adequate supervision by their legal representatives.

alcohol.title: XI. Alcohol and Substance Consumption
content: 11.1. The consumption of alcohol and substances on the properties offered on the Platform is subject to the rules and restrictions set by each Host, as well as applicable legislation on the consumption of alcohol and controlled substances.
11.2. Users are responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations on the consumption of alcohol and substances, including age restrictions and safety standards.

11.3. Pool & Chill shall not be liable for damage, accidents, or consequences arising from the consumption of alcohol or substances on the properties; such responsibility lies solely with the Host and the Guest.

moneyLaundering.title: XII. Money Laundering Prevention
content: 12.1. Pool & Chill is committed to complying with all applicable legal provisions on the prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing, in accordance with the Law for Transparency and Regulation of Financial Services and other applicable regulations.

12.2. Users agree to provide truthful, complete, and up-to-date information when requested and to cooperate with Pool & Chill in any identity verification procedure or customer due diligence process required by law.

12.3. Pool & Chill reserves the right to suspend or cancel any transaction it considers suspicious or that may be related to money laundering or terrorist financing and to report such activities to the competent authorities when required by law.

payments.title: XIII. Payments and Processing
content: 13.1. Payments are processed through the Stripe payment platform, which meets the highest security standards for financial transaction processing.
13.2. User identity verification is performed through the Didit service, which allows user identity to be validated securely and in accordance with applicable regulations.
13.3. The Platform's technological infrastructure is hosted on Firebase, which provides advanced security measures for data protection.
13.4. All data is encrypted both in transit (via TLS/SSL protocols) and at rest, ensuring the protection of Users' sensitive information.

13.5. Pool & Chill does not store Users' complete banking data. Credit and debit card information is processed and stored exclusively by Stripe in accordance with its security and compliance policies (PCI DSS).

13.7. Clarification on payment flow and custody of funds:
• Payments made through the Platform are processed exclusively by Stripe, an authorized and regulated payment platform under applicable legislation.
• Stripe is the entity that temporarily holds the funds corresponding to reservations, acting as payment processor and custodian of financial resources.
• Pool & Chill does not directly hold Users' financial resources. Pool & Chill acts solely as a technological intermediary that facilitates the connection between Hosts and Guests.
• Pool & Chill does not operate as a credit institution, financial institution, custodial entity, or any other entity subject to the supervision of the CNBV, CONDUSEF, or any other financial authority.
• Pool & Chill does not take deposits from the public and is limited exclusively to receiving commissions for the technological intermediation it provides.

jurisdiction.title: XIV. Jurisdiction and Competence
content: 14.1. These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Mexican States, without giving effect to any conflict-of-laws principles.

14.2. For any dispute, conflict, or difference arising from or related to these Terms, the use of the Platform, or any transaction conducted through it, the parties expressly submit to the jurisdiction and competence of the competent courts of Mexico City, waiving any other jurisdiction that might apply to them by reason of their present or future domicile or for any other reason.
14.3. If any provision of these Terms is declared null, void, or unenforceable by a competent authority, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

modifications.title: XV. Modifications to the Terms
content: 15.1. Pool & Chill reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time, upon prior notice to Users by publication on the Platform or communication to the registered email address, with at least thirty (30) days' notice.

15.2. Continued use of the Platform after the modifications take effect shall constitute acceptance of the modified Terms. If the User does not agree with the modifications, they must immediately cease using the Platform and request cancellation of their account.

contact.title: XVI. Contact
content: 16.1. For any inquiry, clarification, or notification related to these Terms, Users may contact Pool & Chill through the contact channels provided on the Platform.
16.2. All official notifications and communications between Pool & Chill and Users shall be made by email to the address registered in the User's account or by publication on the Platform.
By using the Pool & Chill Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions of Use in their entirety.

privacy.title: Comprehensive Privacy Notice
privacy.intro: In compliance with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (LFPDPPP), its Regulations, and the Privacy Notice Guidelines published in the Official Gazette on January 17, 2013, Pool & Chill (hereinafter, "the Responsible Party") makes available to personal data subjects this Comprehensive Privacy Notice, in order to disclose the personal data processing practices and policies implemented.

contact.title: Responsible Party Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions, clarifications, or to exercise your ARCO rights related to this Privacy Notice, you may contact us at:
contact.address: Ensarta, 100, between carretera a valladolid and carretera a comunidad el maguey, 20900, Jesús María, Aguascalientes, Mexico
contact.footer: This Privacy Notice is available at all times on the Pool & Chill Platform for your reference.

responsible.title: I. Identity and Domicile of the Responsible Party
content: In compliance with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (hereinafter, the "LFPDPPP") and its Regulations, POOL & CHILL, a commercial company incorporated under the laws of the United Mexican States (hereinafter, "Pool & Chill", "we" or "the Responsible Party"), with domicile at Ensarta, 100, between carretera a valladolid and carretera a comunidad el maguey, 20900, Jesús María, Aguascalientes, Mexico, is responsible for the processing of your personal data.

For the purposes of this Privacy Notice, Pool & Chill acts as Responsible Party for the processing of the personal data you provide through the "Pool & Chill" digital platform, whether through mobile application or website.

Pool & Chill is a digital intermediation platform for the temporary rental of recreational spaces (pools, cabins, and camping areas) between individuals. The Responsible Party is committed to protecting the privacy of data subjects' personal data and guaranteeing the exercise of the right to informational self-determination, as established in Article 16, second paragraph of the Political Constitution of the United Mexican States.

dataCollected.title: II. Personal Data Collected
content: Pool & Chill collects the following personal data from Platform Users:

II.1. Identification data:
• Full name
• Date of birth
• Age
• Nationality
• Official ID photograph
• Official ID number (INE, passport or other official document)
• Electronic or biometric signature (when applicable)

II.2. Contact data:
• Email address
• Phone number (landline and/or mobile)
• Residential address
• Postal code
• City and state of residence

II.3. Financial data:
• Credit or debit card information (processed exclusively by Stripe, with no complete storage by Pool & Chill)
• Banking information for receiving payments (in the case of Hosts)
• Transaction history
• Payment receipts
• Tax information (RFC, CURP, when required)

II.4. Verification data:
• Information provided through the Didit identity verification service
• Scanned official identification documents
• Biometric information (when used for verification)

II.5. Platform usage data:
• Registration and access information (username, encrypted password)
• Reservation history
• Search preferences
• Comments and reviews posted
• Photographs and videos uploaded to the Platform
• Geographic location (when voluntarily provided)
• IP address
• Type of device used
• Operating system and browser version
• Cookies and similar technologies

II.6. Property data (for Hosts):
• Full property address
• Physical characteristics of the property and pool
• Property photographs
• Ownership or authorization information to offer the property
• Legal documents related to the property (when required)

sensitiveData.title: 3. Sensitive Personal Data
content: In accordance with Article 3, Section VI of the LFPDPPP, Pool & Chill collects the following data that may be considered sensitive:

• Facial biometric data: Obtained exclusively during the identity verification process conducted by external provider Didit. This data is processed by Didit and is NOT stored directly by Pool & Chill.
• Voter ID (INE/IFE) image: Used to verify the identity of Hosts. Once verification is complete, Pool & Chill retains only the result (approved/rejected) and not the document images.

The processing of this sensitive data is carried out with the express written consent of the data subject, in accordance with Article 9 of the LFPDPPP. This data is processed under strict enhanced security measures and in accordance with the principle of data minimization.
In no case does Pool & Chill collect data relating to racial or ethnic origin, health status, religious, philosophical, or moral beliefs, union membership, political opinions, or sexual preference.

primaryPurposes.title: III. Primary Processing Purposes
content: The personal data collected will be used for the following primary purposes, which are necessary for the provision of the requested service:

III.1. User account management:
• Create and manage your account on the Platform
• Verify your identity through the Didit service
• Authenticate your access to the Platform
• Keep your user profile updated

III.2. Reservation processing:
• Facilitate the connection between Hosts and Guests
• Process reservation requests
• Confirm and manage reservations
• Communicate relevant information about reservations

III.3. Payment processing:
• Process payments through the Stripe platform
• Manage commissions and fees
• Process refunds when applicable
• Issue tax receipts
• Manage payment-related disputes

III.4. User communication:
• Send notifications about reservations
• Respond to inquiries and support requests
• Send important information about changes to terms of service or policies
• Communicate Platform updates

III.5. Verification and security:
• Verify User identity
• Prevent fraud and illicit activities
• Comply with legal obligations regarding money laundering prevention
• Maintain the security and integrity of the Platform

III.6. Content publication:
• Publish property information (for Hosts)
• Display User reviews and comments
• Share photographs and descriptions of properties

secondaryPurposes.title: IV. Secondary Processing Purposes
content: Additionally, your personal data may be used for the following secondary purposes, which are not necessary for the provision of the service but allow us to provide you with a better experience:

IV.1. Marketing and promotions:
• Send promotional offers and discounts
• Inform about new services or features
• Conduct market research and preference analysis
• Personalize the content and recommendations shown on the Platform

IV.2. Service improvement:
• Analyze Platform usage to improve our services
• Develop new features
• Conduct statistical and user behavior studies
• Optimize the user experience

IV.3. Commercial communications:
• Send newsletters
• Invite participation in loyalty programs
• Share educational content related to the use of pools and recreational spaces
If you do not wish your personal data to be processed for any or all secondary purposes, you may express your objection through the procedure established in the ARCO Rights section of this Notice.

identityVerification.title: 6. Third-Party Identity Verification
content: For Host identity verification, Pool & Chill uses the services of external provider Didit, as follows:

Verification process:
• A secure popup window from the Didit service is opened from the Platform
• The user presents their Voter ID (INE/IFE) before the camera
• Facial biometric verification is performed to confirm identity match with the document
• The process has a 10-minute time limit
• The Platform periodically checks verification status with the backend server

Data shared with Didit:
• INE/IFE image (front and back)
• Facial biometric data captured in real time
• User's email address to link the verification
Completing email verification is a mandatory prerequisite before initiating the identity verification process with Didit.

Didit operates under its own terms of service and privacy policy, which will be presented to the data subject during the verification process. Pool & Chill is not responsible for the processing that Didit performs on the data once transferred, without prejudice to transfer oversight pursuant to Article 36 of the LFPDPPP.

collectionMethods.title: 7. Personal Data Collection Methods
content: In accordance with Article 16, Section IV of the LFPDPPP, your personal data is obtained through the following means:

Direct means (personally provided by the data subject):
• Online registration form (11-step process)
• Contact form on the website
• Upload of photographs and identity documents
• Interaction with Google Maps for location selection
• Identity verification process with Didit
• Direct communications via email

Automatic means (collected during browsing):
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies
• Server logs
• Firebase Analytics for aggregated usage and performance data
• Browser local storage (localStorage) for session tokens and language preference

Indirect means (obtained from third parties):
• Identity verification result provided by Didit
• Reverse geolocation data provided by Google Maps (coordinate-to-address conversion)

All collected data is processed in accordance with the eight principles established in Articles 6 to 13 of the LFPDPPP: lawfulness, consent, information, quality, purpose, loyalty, proportionality, and responsibility.

dataTransfers.title: V. Personal Data Transfers
content: Pool & Chill makes the following personal data transfers to third parties, without requiring your additional consent in accordance with Article 37 of the LFPDPPP:

V.1. Transfer to Stripe:
• Data transferred: Credit/debit card information, transaction information, identification data necessary for payment processing.
• Purpose: Secure payment processing and compliance with financial obligations.
• Country of destination: United States of America.
• Security measures: Stripe complies with PCI DSS standards and maintains international security certifications.

V.2. Transfer to Didit:
For identity verification and fraud prevention purposes, Pool & Chill uses the services of Didit, a digital identity verification platform. Didit Identity, Inc., a private entity that provides identity verification services, acts as data processor, processing only the data that Pool & Chill provides to it for identity verification and fraud detection purposes.
• Data transferred: Transfers to Didit may include: official ID, biometric selfies, date of birth, photograph, verification data, associated metadata, and any other data strictly necessary for identity verification and fraud detection.
• Purpose: To allow User identity verification, prevention of duplicate accounts, bots, fraud and potentially illegal activities, as well as to fulfill Pool & Chill's contractual obligations.
• Domicile and country of operation: Didit Identity, Inc. is headquartered in San Francisco, United States of America. When using Didit's services, some personal data may be transferred and stored on servers located outside Mexico.
• Didit, as processor, is obligated to implement technical, administrative and physical security measures to protect personal data, and will use them only for the purposes authorized by Pool & Chill and the User.

V.3. Transfer to Firebase (Google Cloud Platform):
• Data transferred: All personal data stored on the Platform, including profile information, reservations, communications and user-generated content.
• Purpose: Secure data storage and provision of technological infrastructure for the Platform.
• Country of destination: United States of America (with possible replication in other countries where Google Cloud Platform has data centers).
• Security measures: Firebase implements enterprise-level security measures, including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls and continuous monitoring.

V.4. Other transfers:
Pool & Chill may also transfer personal data when required by law, court order or competent authority, or when necessary to protect the rights, property or safety of Pool & Chill, its users or third parties.

aroRights.title: VII. ARCO Rights
content: You have the right to know what personal data we hold about you, for what purposes we use it and the conditions of use we give it (Right of Access). You also have the right to request the correction of your personal data when it is outdated, inaccurate or incomplete (Right of Rectification); to request that we delete it from our records or databases when you consider it is not being used properly (Right of Cancellation); and to oppose the processing of your personal data for specific purposes (Right of Opposition). These rights are known as ARCO rights.

VII.1. Procedure to exercise ARCO rights:
1. Submit your request in writing to the Pool & Chill Personal Data Protection Department, by email: team@poolandchill.com.mx
2. The request must contain: name of the data subject, email registered on the Platform, clear and precise description of the personal data regarding which you seek to exercise an ARCO right, indication of the right you wish to exercise (Access, Rectification, Cancellation or Opposition), and any other element that facilitates locating the personal data.
3. Attach a copy of valid official identification (INE, passport or other official document) to prove your identity.
4. If the request is submitted by a legal representative, you must attach the notarial power of attorney or document proving representation.

VII.2. Response timeframes:
Pool & Chill will respond to your request within a maximum of twenty (20) business days from the date we receive your complete request. This deadline may be extended once for an equal period when the circumstances of the case so justify, which will be notified to you by email.

VII.3. Delivery of information:
If your request is granted, Pool & Chill will implement it within a maximum of fifteen (15) business days from the date we communicate the response. Delivery of information will be made by email or, at the data subject's request, by simple copy in digital format.

VII.4. Consent revocation:
You may revoke the consent you have granted us for the processing of your personal data at any time. However, we may not be able to attend to your request immediately in all cases, as we may be required by law to continue processing your data. For certain purposes, revocation of your consent will mean that we cannot continue to provide the service you requested. Consent revocation must follow the same procedure established for exercising ARCO rights.

dataRetention.title: VIII. Retention and Deletion of Personal Data
content:
VIII.1. Retention period:
Your personal data will be retained for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Notice and, thereafter, for the periods established by applicable legislation, including: statutes of limitations for legal actions; tax and accounting obligations (generally 5 years under Mexican tax legislation); money laundering prevention obligations; and any other period established by law.

VIII.2. Data deletion:
Once the established retention periods have been fulfilled, your personal data will be securely and irreversibly deleted from our systems, using methods that guarantee that the information cannot be recovered or reconstructed.

VIII.3. Exceptions:
Pool & Chill may retain certain personal data for additional periods when necessary to: comply with legal obligations; resolve disputes; enforce our agreements; or protect the rights, property or safety of Pool & Chill, its users or third parties.

consentRevocation.title: Consent Revocation
content: In accordance with Article 8, second paragraph of the LFPDPPP, you may revoke the consent you have granted us for the processing of your personal data at any time, without retroactive effects. To revoke your consent you must follow the same procedure established for exercising ARCO rights (Section VII).

useLimitation.title: 11. Limitation of Data Use and Disclosure
content: Pool & Chill provides the following mechanisms for you to limit the use and disclosure of your personal data, in accordance with Article 16, Section VII of the LFPDPPP:

• Exclusion List Registration: Send an email to team@poolandchill.com with the subject 'EXCLUSION LIST' to stop receiving promotional communications
• Cookie settings: You can configure your browser to reject or delete cookies
• Opt-out of secondary purposes: You can limit data use exclusively to primary purposes
• Notification cancellation: You can disable email notifications using the unsubscribe link included in each communication
Additionally, you can register with PROFECO's Public Registry to Avoid Advertising (REPEP) to limit commercial communications, through the website www.repep.profeco.gob.mx

cookies.title: IX. Use of Cookies and Similar Technologies
content:
IX.1. Cookies:
The Platform uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your user experience, analyze Platform usage and personalize the content displayed.

IX.2. Types of cookies used:
• Technical cookies: Necessary for the basic operation of the Platform
• Performance cookies: Allow analysis of how users interact with the Platform
• Functionality cookies: Allow remembering your preferences and personalizing your experience
• Marketing cookies: Used to display relevant content and conduct marketing analysis

IX.3. Cookie control:
You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. However, please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the Platform.

IX.4. Tracking technologies:
The Platform may also use tracking technologies such as tracking pixels, web beacons and similar technologies to collect information about your use of the Platform.

childrenPrivacy.title: 13. Children's Privacy
content: Pool & Chill is not directed at minors under 18 years of age. The Platform requires all users to be individuals over 18 years of age with full legal capacity to contract.
Pool & Chill does NOT intentionally collect personal data from minors. The registration form includes date of birth as a mandatory field to verify the user's age.

If Pool & Chill becomes aware that personal data has been collected from a minor under 18 without the verifiable consent of their parent or legal guardian, it will take the necessary measures to immediately delete such information from its servers and databases, in accordance with Article 4 of the General Law on the Rights of Children and Adolescents.

If you are a parent or legal guardian and are aware that a minor has provided personal information to Pool & Chill without your consent, please contact us immediately at team@poolandchill.com so we can take appropriate action.

securityMeasures.title: VI. Security Measures
content: Pool & Chill implements administrative, technical and physical security measures to protect your personal data against damage, loss, alteration, destruction or unauthorized use, access or processing:

VI.1. Administrative measures:
• Internal data protection policies and procedures
• Periodic training of staff on data protection
• Access controls based on roles and responsibilities
• Periodic security audits

VI.2. Technical measures:
• Data encryption in transit using TLS/SSL protocols
• Data encryption at rest using advanced encryption algorithms
• Multi-factor authentication systems when applicable
• Continuous monitoring of technological infrastructure
• Firewalls and intrusion detection systems
• Periodic backups and disaster recovery plans
• Regular software updates and security patches

VI.3. Physical measures:
• Physical access control to premises where data is stored
• Video surveillance and access control systems
• Secure destruction of physical documents when applicable

Despite the security measures implemented, no data transmission or storage system is completely secure. Pool & Chill cannot guarantee the absolute security of personal data, although it is committed to maintaining the highest security standards available in the industry.

updates.title: X. Privacy Notice Modifications
content: Pool & Chill reserves the right to modify this Privacy Notice at any time. Modifications will be published on the Platform and, when substantial, you will be notified by email or by a prominent notice on the Platform.
You are advised to review this Privacy Notice periodically to stay informed about how we protect your personal data.

consentClause.title: XI. Consent
content: By providing your personal data through the Pool & Chill Platform, you grant your express consent for the processing of your personal data in accordance with the terms established in this Privacy Notice.

complaints.title: XII. Supervisory Authority
content: If you consider that your personal data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to file a complaint with the National Institute for Transparency, Access to Information and Personal Data Protection (INAI), which is the authority responsible for overseeing compliance with the LFPDPPP in Mexico.
For more information, you may visit the INAI website: www.inai.org.mx
